1.0.0.name: wordpress/wassup-keywords
1.0.0.description:
Ever wanted to know what actual keyword phrases are bringing visitors to your site?

Well, this information is recorded by the Wassup visitor plugin, which is cool... However, it doesn't actually give you a way of listing the keywords together, it just shows you a long list of detailed visitor stats, so I put this little addon page module together to datamine your Wassup database and show a ranked list of your keywords and which search engines they came from. (Obviously you need Wassup installed.)

You can also check your Google rankings for any of the keywords with the click of a button if they came from Google. A neat little way of seeing which keyword phrases are working for you so you can optimize your blog and posts for them even more, as even a slight change in your ranking for a phrase can bring in extra traffic.
